sections.title: Introduction to Data Preparation
sections.details: Overview of the importance of properly preparing data for visualization and analysis in Nomic Atlas.

sections.title: Data Formatting Requirements
sections.details: Detailed instructions on how to format datasets for compatibility with Nomic Atlas, including supported file types and data structures.
